trans-unit.source: Provides methods and properties used to perform intelligent, rule-based data point label positioning to resolve overlapping data point label issues.
trans-unit.target: 提供方法和属性用于执行智能、 基于规则的数据点标签定位若要解决重叠的数据点标签问题。

trans-unit.source: When smart labels are enabled, the chart repositions overlapping data point labels, based on a set of user-defined rules.
trans-unit.target: 启用智能标签后，图表将重新定位重叠的数据点标签基于一组用户定义的规则。

trans-unit.source: Callout lines will be drawn to link the label with its data point.
trans-unit.target: 将绘制标注线条链接其数据点标签。

trans-unit.source: The visual attributes of the callout line can be controlled.
trans-unit.target: 可以控制标注线条的可视特性。

trans-unit.source: These visual attributes include color, line style, and line width.
trans-unit.target: 这些可视特性包括颜色、 线条样式和线条宽度。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.CalloutStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.CalloutLineAnchorCapStyle%2A> properties control the embellishments, such as arrowheads, that appear at the end of the callout line.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.CalloutStyle%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.CalloutLineAnchorCapStyle%2A>属性控制的修饰符，如箭头，显示的标注线条末尾。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.CalloutLineAnchorCapStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.CalloutStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.CalloutLineColor%2A> property can be set to any <xref:System.Drawing.Color> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.CalloutLineColor%2A>属性可以设置为任何<xref:System.Drawing.Color>对象。</xref:System.Drawing.Color> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.CalloutLineColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the color of the callout line, you will also automatically set the color of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.CalloutLineAnchorCapStyle%2A> and the embellishment defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.CalloutStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置标注线条的颜色，则还会自动将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.CalloutLineAnchorCapStyle%2A>和所定义的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.CalloutStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.CalloutStyle%2A>修饰符</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.CalloutLineAnchorCapStyle%2A>的颜色

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.CalloutLineWidth%2A> property controls the pixel width of the callout line.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.CalloutLineWidth%2A>属性控制的标注线条的像素宽度。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.CalloutLineWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use of this property will also scale the embellishments of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.CalloutLineAnchorCapStyle%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.CalloutStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性也将缩放<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.CalloutLineAnchorCapStyle%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.CalloutStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.CalloutStyle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.CalloutLineAnchorCapStyle%2A>的修饰符

trans-unit.source: The movement of smart labels can be controlled through the use of several motion-related properties.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过使用多个运动相关属性控制智能标签的移动。

trans-unit.source: These define the rules of movement for the direction, distance and whether the data point label is allowed to leave the plotting area.
trans-unit.target: 这些将定义移动的方向，距离的规则和指示的数据点标签是否允许将保留在绘图区。

trans-unit.source: The default movement rules will normally resolve most issues.
trans-unit.target: 默认移动规则通常将解决大多数问题。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.MaxMovingDistance%2A> defines a value that specifies the maximum distance in pixels from the data point that data point labels are allowed to be moved in case of overlapping.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.MaxMovingDistance%2A>定义一个值，指定以像素为单位的数据的最大距离情况下允许使用数据点标签移开重叠的点。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.MaxMovingDistance%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.MinMovingDistance%2A> property defines a value that specifies the minimum distance in pixels from the data point that data point labels will be moved in case of overlapping.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.MinMovingDistance%2A>属性定义一个值，指定以像素为单位的数据的最小距离点，将发生重叠移动数据点标签。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.MinMovingDistance%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a data point label needs to be repositioned, the label will be moved by at least the number of pixels specified.
trans-unit.target: 当数据点标签需要可重新定位时，标签将至少移动指定的像素数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.IsOverlappedHidden%2A> property indicates whether the labels are hidden when overlapping issues cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.IsOverlappedHidden%2A>属性指示是否当重叠问题无法解析时是否隐藏标签。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.IsOverlappedHidden%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.IsOverlappedHidden%2A> property is `true`, and the data point cannot be drawn within the area specified by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.MinMovingDistance%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.MaxMovingDistance%2A> in the directions allowed by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.MovingDirection%2A>, the data point label will not be drawn.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.IsOverlappedHidden%2A>属性是`true`，无法在指定的区域内绘制数据点和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.MinMovingDistance%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.MaxMovingDistance%2A>中所允许的方向<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.MovingDirection%2A>，将不绘制数据点标签。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.MovingDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.MaxMovingDistance%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.MinMovingDistance%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.IsOverlappedHidden%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.MovingDirection%2A> property defines the direction(s) in which the data point label can be moved.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.MovingDirection%2A>属性定义可以在其中移动数据点标签的方向。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.MovingDirection%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property accepts one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelAlignmentStyles> value or a bitwise-OR of multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelAlignmentStyles> values.
trans-unit.target: 此属性接受一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelAlignmentStyles>值或按位 OR，多个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelAlignmentStyles>值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelAlignmentStyles> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelAlignmentStyles>

trans-unit.source: The default is the bitwise-OR of all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelAlignmentStyles> values, to allow repositioning in all possible directions except to the center of the data point.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是位或所有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelAlignmentStyles>值，以允许在所有可能的方向不同点的数据中心重新定位。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelAlignmentStyles>

trans-unit.source: Smart labels are not supported for the following chart types: - Bar charts: bar and hundred-percent-stacked bar charts.
trans-unit.target: 以下图表类型不支持智能标签:-栏图表︰ 栏和百分比堆积条形图。

trans-unit.source: - Shape charts: pie, doughnut, polar and radar charts.
trans-unit.target: -形状图︰ 饼图、 圆环图、 极坐标图和雷达图图表。

trans-unit.source: - Range charts: range, range column and range bar charts.
trans-unit.target: -范围图︰ 范围、 范围柱形图和范围条形图。

trans-unit.source: - Stacked area charts: stacked area and hundred-percent-stacked area charts.
trans-unit.target: -堆积面积图︰ 堆积面积图和百分比堆积面积图。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle"></xref> object can be drawn outside the plotting area.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个标志，指定是否<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle"></xref>对象可以绘制在绘图区之外。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelOutsidePlotAreaStyle"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelOutsidePlotAreaStyle"> </xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of the label callout.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置标签标注的背景色。

trans-unit.source: This property is only applicable when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.CalloutStyle%2A> property is set to a value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelCalloutStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性才适用的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.CalloutStyle%2A>属性设置为值为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelCalloutStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelCalloutStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.CalloutStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the anchor cap style of the label callout line.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置标签的标注线条定位点线帽样式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnchorCapStyle"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnchorCapStyle"> </xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the label callout line.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置标签的标注线条的颜色。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of the label callout line.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置标签的标注线条的样式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"> </xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the label callout line.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置标签的标注线条的宽度。

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer " name="integer " href=""></xref>value.
trans-unit.target: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer " name="integer " href=""></xref>value.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the callout style of the repositioned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置标注样式重新定位的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelCalloutStyle"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelCalloutStyle"> </xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle"></xref> algorithm is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个标志，指示是否<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle"></xref>算法是否启用。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if an algorithm will be applied to prevent data point labels from overlapping.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>如果将应用一种算法，以防止数据点标签重叠。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref> if overlapping of data point labels will not be prevented.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref>如果不会阻止数据点标签重叠。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether the point labels are allowed to overlap a point marker.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于指定是否允许点标签重叠点标记的标志。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if data point labels are permitted to overlap point markers.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>如果数据点标签允许重叠点标记。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref> if data point labels will be prevented from overlapping the point markers.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref>如果数据点标签将阻止重叠的点标记。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether overlapped labels that cannot be repositioned will be hidden.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个标志，指示是否将隐藏不能重新定位的标签重叠。

trans-unit.source: If the point cannot be drawn within the area specified by the properties <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.MinMovingDistance%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.MaxMovingDistance%2A>, in the directions allowed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.MovingDirection%2A>, property, and this property is `true`, the data point label will not be drawn.
trans-unit.target: 如果无法的属性指定的区域内绘制点<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.MinMovingDistance%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.MaxMovingDistance%2A>中所允许的方向, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.MovingDirection%2A>，属性，并且此属性是`true`，将不绘制数据点标签。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.MovingDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.MaxMovingDistance%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.MinMovingDistance%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Smart labels only work when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelStyle.Angle%2A> property is set to zero.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 智能标签才起作用时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelStyle.Angle%2A>属性设置为零。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelStyle.Angle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if labels will be hidden if they overlap.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>如果将隐藏标签，如果它们重叠。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref> if overlapped labels will not be hidden.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref>如果将未隐藏的标签重叠。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum distance, in pixels, that the overlapped <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle"></xref> object can be moved from the marker.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的最大距离，以像素为单位的重叠<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle"></xref>对象可以从标记移开。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the maximum distance in pixels from the data point that data point labels are allowed to be moved in case of overlapping.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定以像素为单位的数据的最大距离情况下允许使用数据点标签移开重叠的点。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum distance, in pixels, that the overlapped <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle"></xref> object can be moved from the marker.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的最小距离，以像素为单位的重叠<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle"></xref>对象可以从标记移开。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the minimum distance in pixels from the data point that data point labels are allowed to be moved in case of overlapping.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定以像素为单位的数据的最小距离情况下允许使用数据点标签移开重叠的点。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the direction(s) in which the overlapped <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle"></xref> object is allowed to be moved.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在方向重叠<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle"></xref>对象都可以移动。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelAlignmentStyles"></xref> enumeration value or multiple bitwise OR'd <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelAlignmentStyles"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelAlignmentStyles"> </xref>枚举值或多个按位 OR 运算符具有<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelAlignmentStyles"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is the bitwise OR of all <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelAlignmentStyles"></xref> values to allow repositioning in all directions except to the center of the data point.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是所有的按位或<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelAlignmentStyles"></xref>以允许在不同数据中心点的所有方向重新定位的值。
